title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: UNI Drops 7.1% as Nearly All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aave (AAVE) joined Uniswap (UNI) as an underperformer, declining 7% from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2612.03, down 3.2% (-86.41) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

One of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SOL (+1.4%) and APT (-0.5%).

Laggards: UNI (-7.1%) and AAVE (-7.0%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is down 3.2% with nearly all assets trading lower and significant declines in UNI (-7.1%) and AAVE (-7.0%).
